title: Women's Bikini
description: Women's Bikini division is about balance, symmetry, and a lean but healthy physique. Competitors are judged on stage presence, posing, and overall aesthetic look.

title: Men's Physique
description: Menâ€™s Physique division rewards a lean, muscular upper body with emphasis on aesthetics and proportion. Competitors wear boardshorts and are judged on V-taper and stage presentation.

title: Men's Classic Physique
description: Classic Physique aims to capture the golden-era bodybuilding look: symmetry, proportion, and flowing lines, with mandatory classic poses.

title: Bodybuilding
description: The traditional bodybuilding division. Competitors are judged on muscle size, conditioning, symmetry, and overall presentation.
